TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SrgsRule extends System.Object

span.span: Represents a grammar rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別來建立新的規則，在執行階段，或在執行階段修改現有的文法資料流或檔案中的規則。Use the class to create a new rule at run time or to modify a rule in an existing grammar stream or file at run time. 中的單字和片語所指定中所定義的文法物件執行個體限制辨識器必須能夠識別語音的輸入。The words and phrases specified by objects in grammars defined by instances limit the spoken input that the recognizer must be able to identify. 物件會指定必須藉由訂購包含它們的物件讀出單字和片語的順序。An object specifies the sequence in which words and phrases must be spoken by ordering the objects that contain them. 單字與片語在規則中的會以物件表示這類， ， ，和項目。Words and phrases within a rule are represented by objects such as , , , and elements. 使用屬性存取子的集合物件物件包含。Use the property to access the collection of child objects that an object contains. 您可以判斷是否可以藉由設定規則參考來自外部文法中的規則中指定其屬性。You can determine whether an can be specified in a rule reference from a rule in an external grammar by setting its property. 是不合法定義也就是空的或只包含空白字元。It is not legal to define an that is empty or that contains only white space. 此類別代表`rule`World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 中所定義的項目[語音辨識文法規格 (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)。This class represents the `rule` element that is defined in the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761). 如需 SRGS`rule`項目和 System.Speech，其支援的詳細資料請參閱[規則項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/da67b4aa-0545-426a-a02f-1417b968021e)。For information about the SRGS `rule` element and details about its support by System.Speech, see [rule Element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/da67b4aa-0545-426a-a02f-1417b968021e).

member this.Id : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定規則的識別項。

span.span: Gets or sets the identifier for the rule.
The identifier for the rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 規則識別碼是包含規則的名稱的字串。The identifier for a rule is a string that contains the name of the rule. 值，用來設定必須遵守下列規則：A value used to set must adhere to the following rules: - 值必須是有效的 XML 名稱，如同[可延伸標記語言 (XML) 1.0 （第五版）](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml/)。The value must be a valid XML name, as defined in [Extensible Markup Language (XML) 1.0 (Fifth Edition)](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml/). 為了釋義這個定義，有效的 XML 名稱必須以字母、 底線 ('_') 或冒號開頭 (': ') 和後面可以接著零或多個利用 NameChar 字元 （也定義於 XML 規格）。To paraphrase this definition, a valid XML name must begin with a letter, an underscore ('_'), or a colon (':') and can be followed by zero or more NameChar characters (also defined in the XML specification). - 值可以是 「 NULL 」 或 「 無效 」 或 「 垃圾 」。The value can be "NULL" or "VOID" or "GARBAGE". - 此值不得包含任何無效的規則識別碼字元。The value cannot contain any invalid rule ID character. 這些字元: '？ '，' \*'，'+'、 '|'，' （'，'）、' ^'，'$'、 '/'、 ';'，'。 '，'='、 '\<'，' >'，' ['，']'，' {'，'} '、'\\\\'、' '，'\t'、 '\r' 和 '\n'。These characters are: '?', '\*', '+', '|', '(', '), '^', '$', '/', ';', '.', '=', '\<', '>', '[', ']', '{', '}', '\\\\', ' ', '\t', '\r', and '\n'.

exception.span: 嘗試將 設定為無效的值。

span.span: An attempt is made to set to an invalid value.
